text:
In our code for 1.0.4 we had the static call:
BasicConfigurator.disableAll()
in a static block, which compiled cleanly.  Now with 1.1beta the 
BasicConfigurator.disableAll() call has been deprecated, BUT it is also no 
longer static, which now causes a compilation error.  By looking at the 
documentation the same goes for all BasicConfigurator.disable methods.
creator: francisco.marin@stanfordalumni.org
